summary: Bikes vs Cars is a documentary about the bike and what an amazing tool for change it can be. It highlights a conflict in city planning between bikes, cars and a growing reliance on fossil fuels.
cast: Aline Cavalcante|Dan Koeppel|Raquel Rolnik|Joel Ewanick|Ivan Naurholm|Nicolas Habib|Don Ward|Gil Peñalosa|Liliana Godoy|Christina Deckwirth|Joshua Dysart|Denzil Minnan-Wong|Fabio Mendonça|Evelyn Araripe|Otto Koeppel|Kalee Thompson|Karem Rojas|Ricardo Correa|Antonio Villaraigosa|Bill Rosendahl|Mike Miles|Richard Katz|Michael Barbour|Zev Yaroslavsky|Rob Ford|Gilbert Cedillo
title: Bicicletas vs coches
